modShortDescription: Tired of radiated zombies killing your FPS? This mod will help you! Turns off green particles on radiated zombies and adds glowing green eyes.
modDescription:
Tired of radiated zombies killing your FPS? This mod will help you! Turns off green particles on radiated zombies and adds glowing green eyes you can see in the dark.

Replaces radiated [zombie textures](https://7daystodiemods.com/tag/7-days-to-die-zombie-textures/) with normal textures for the body. So that the entire thing doesn’t glow green killing your FPS. Only adds a glowing green eyes. The eyes made by Mumpfy for Guppycor. You can still tell they’re radiates, but they don’t kill your frames.

[Download](https://gitlab.com/guppycur/guppymods/-/archive/master/guppymods-master.zip?path=Guppycur%27s_Rad_Eyes)

The forum topic of the mod is [here](https://community.7daystodie.com/topic/9144-guppycurs-modlets/).

**Credits:** [Guppycur](https://7daystodiemods.com/tag/guppycur/), Mumpfy
